# oxc/missing-throw

<div class="rule-meta">
<span class="default-on">
âœ… This rule is turned on by default.
</span>
<span class="fix">
ðŸ’¡ A suggestion is available for this rule.
</span>
</div>

### What it does

Checks whether the `throw` keyword is missing in front of a `new` expression.

### Example

```javascript
function foo() {
  throw Error();
}
const foo = () => {
  new Error();
};
```
